cause.description:
It's a simple objective, and although the title is ambitious I in no way expect anyone to donate that much, because I understand that not everyone can do that, just like I can't. But the real goal is to raise awareness, and to assist in bringing necessities to the people of Dar fur.
1. Starvation in Darfur must end.
2. Everyone can help the cause some way.
3. Everyone deserves to live.
cause.mission: Raise Money to Feed all the starving children and adults in the Darfur region.
cause.name: 10 dollars a day
